segments.text: I'm really feeling quite a bit of tension watching this whole scene unfold.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: That sink is absolutely gushing water onto the floor, creating a massive puddle.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't believe the woman hasn't noticed her foot is soaking wet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Someone is definitely going to slip and fall very soon.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Then there's the boy, climbing on that ridiculously wobbly stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It looks like it could tip over at any second, and he's so high up.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He could seriously injure himself, or break something valuable.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Why are these children being so reckless in the kitchen?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: And where is the adult's supervision in all of this?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The potential for accidents here is just staggering, it makes me so anxious.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This entire situation feels like a disaster waiting to happen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's truly infuriating to see so many risks being ignored.
segments.speaker: PAR
